duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in unstructured data remediation projects, focusing on group share drives and network files.
Develop tools such as the group walker tool and AI-driven keyword tools for research and documentation preservation.
Collaborate with senior division leaders and conduct SME and project champion meetings with divisional leadership.
Review documentation, provide feedback, and field requests through queue, with a focus on record classification and scanning.
Support group share ownership and provide real-time assistance to clients, with a constant focus on improvement and evolution of the role.
Connect with different LOBs by setting up regular meetings and becoming the point of contact for each business division.
Take ownership of tasks, manage time efficiently, and communicate effectively with diverse business and technical audiences.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
